title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: The 'copy package' feature in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3 is behaving strangely. When selecting xxx as the destination, the expected behavior is that the destination should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
OB: When using the 'copy package' feature in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3 and selecting xxx as the destination, something unexpected happens.
EB: The expected behavior is that the destination should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
1. Open the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3.
2. Use the 'copy package' feature.
3. Select xxx as the destination.
